definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: The child lived but had major medical problems including oxygen deprivation and bleeding in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 小孩存活了下來，但患有缺氧及腦出血等嚴重病症。

sentences.english: Objective To research on patients with hypertensive intracerebral hemorrhage surgical timing.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究高血壓腦出血患者的最佳手術時機。

sentences.english: Conclusion The high incidence of ICH often occurs in the cold months and on awaking in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 結論腦出血常發生於寒冷的季節及晨清醒狀態。

sentences.english: The results indicate that Rhubarb inhibit nervous lesion and cerebral edema in rats.
sentences.chinese: 表明生大黃可改善腦出血大鼠的神經損害。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the influence of mannitol on brain edema after cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討甘露醇對腦出血後腦水腫的影響。

sentences.english: Shaking violence can include bleeding and swelling in the brain and retinal hemorrhages.
sentences.chinese: 劇烈的搖晃會導致腦出血或者腫脹以及視網膜出血。

sentences.english: Objective To study the side effect on mannitol to the prognosis of spontaneous cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究甘露醇對自發性腦出血預後的不良影響。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical features and risk factors of recurrent intracerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討複發性腦出血的臨牀特點和相關危險因素。

sentences.english: Ultra-early treatment may obviously improve the therapeutic effects in patients with hypertensive cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 超早期治療高血壓腦出血可明顯提高臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical effect of medium & severe cerebral hemorrhage patients treated with minimally invasive surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討微創術治療中重型腦出血患者的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: The micro-damage puncture could reduce the formation of brain edema after ICH.
sentences.chinese: 微創血腫清除術能改善腦出血後的腦水腫形成。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the therapeutic effect of small bone window craniotomy in the treatment of hypertensive cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小骨窗開顱術治療高血壓腦出血的療效。

sentences.english: Incidences of QTd prolongation in the two groups were significantly higher when compared with normal control group.
sentences.chinese: 腦出血組和腦梗死組QT離散度較對照組顯著延長。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the effects of Tongluo drug on prognosis of cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中藥通絡藥物治療腦出血的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Conclusions Neuronal injury of rats with cerebral hemorrhage is related to the decrease of CCO activity.
sentences.chinese: 結論腦出血神經元損傷與神經元CCO活性降低有關。

sentences.english: Stereotactic microinvasive aspiration in treatment of basal ganglion hema trema.
sentences.chinese: 立體定向微創抽吸治療高血壓基底節區腦出血。

definition: consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
